name: Don't Shoot! (Redmont Games)
description:
Don't shoot - or you might regret it. 

You can shoot with left-click and move around with WASD.

You start off in a room with two enemies. However, after shooting these enemies you might realise that it isn't quite that simple. Your bullets bounce indefinitely - and could end up being your own undoing. Once the bullets start bouncing the walls will also slowly crumble away and reveal even more enemies. You're faced with a choice: Do you simply try to avoid the enemies or shoot them? If you're not careful, things could very quickly get out of control.
